products.title: Caf Style Hampton Phantom Grey Faux Wood Shutter
products.description: The caf style hampton phantom grey faux wood shutter is a timeless update for any interior. The classic form of this gorgeous faux wood shutter is beautifully accentuated by the delicate grey finish, and will look the part in both traditional and contemporary inspired spaces. You can enjoy this simply luxurious look within a bathroom or kitchen too, thanks to its moisture resistant upvc construction.

products.title: Caf Style Hampton Moonlit Grey Faux Wood Shutter
products.description: Make the most of natural light in your home whilst beautifully accenting your interior with this fashionable shutter design. The caf style hampton moonlit grey faux wood shutter is finished in a soft muted grey shade for a modern mood that is so versatile. This bright and stylish shutter is produced from moisture resistant upvc material so you can enjoy the look in bathrooms and kitchens too. products.title: Lexington Grey Thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.

products.title: Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: For a darker grey in your window the hampton grey pleated is a superb option. The colour is not created in a block but rather created from a series of short strokes of mid-tone and darker greys, which layer into a deep grey fabric. Additional shading comes from the pleated ripples that create natural highlights and pooling shadows. The perfect fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free installation in under 15 minutes.

products.title: Kingston Flint Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: The kingston fabrics have a pebble-dash effect to them that creates an organic fabric that matches gorgeously with other organic materials and furnishings. Kingston flint's stone-grey tone is a dappling texture in a dimout style, allowing gentle light levels to pass through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly.

products.title: Lexington Blockout Taupe Solar/thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.

products.title: Daytona, Horizon Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Soft and subtle, the daytona in horizon grey is a pretty shade of grey that works as an attractive neutral for stronger tones. The durable, high quality faux wood the shutter is made from is energy efficient, water-resistant, and not prone to warping or cracking. Choose from three distinct shutter types. Match the horizon grey to a rich red feature wall for a look that really stands out. This cosy colour scheme is perfect for a living room.

products.title: Daytona, Dignity Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: An attractive mid-grey, the dignity grey, from the daytona range, can be the star of the show or the colour-popping neutral. Choose from versatile tier on tier, traditional full height, or boutique caf styles. Team the dignity grey with a dark grass green for an unusual and quirky colour scheme that brings the outside in. Try this for a striking look in the dining room or den. Include the occasional pale grey to lighten the look and add some extra depth to the theme.

products.title: Daytona, Shark Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: In prettiest pale grey, the daytona in shark grey is sweet and subtle. The durable, high quality faux wood that it's made from is water-resistant, so won't warp or crack in any room in the home. Choose from three shutter styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. Team the shark grey with a pure red tone for a strong and stylish colour scheme, perfect for a contemporary home. Keep the red to a minimum to avoid overpowering the room and include plenty of white and grey tones.

products.title: Bayham, Pewter - Vista Blind
products.description: Bayham pewter combines a modern colour with the latest in elegant contemporary design. The gentle hanging voile panels serve as the perfect lens through which to view the deep tone of pewter as you control the ambience in your home with ease like never before. Pewter lends an authentically natural colour to the modern home and allows you to create a theme around stone and wood finishes. Slate floors or small touches like table mats and coasters really come together in the dining room.

products.title: Bayham, Taupe Grey - Vista Blind
products.description: Bayham taupe grey allows you to add a unique modern touch to your home whilst combining it with a timeless colour that brings a classically calming presence to your decor. The lightweight voile hangs effortlessly as you adjust the angle of the finely woven fabric to give the perfect light level for any occasion. We love the look of taupe grey in the kitchen or a cosy cottage style living room. Woods, slate, the fireplace, no matter what authentic style you decide to pair it with you are guaranteed to create a harmony with the existing decor whilst adding the modern touch of their unique vista style.

products.title: Natura, Mist - Vista Blind
products.description: Natura mist combines a lightweight and elegant voile and a richly detailed fabric that immerses your senses to create a modern addition that adds to any home. With a level of craftsmanship and care that is unrivalled, the mist fabric is integrated with the voile panels so that you have complete control of the light in your home. A unique blend of the aesthetic and functional worlds. Mist captures the imagination by taking your eye on a journey through a whole spectrum of colours and tones.

products.title: Daytona, Stratus Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Cool, calm, and bang on trend, the dove grey tone of the daytona in stratus grey is soothing and serene. All of the daytona range are made from high quality, durable faux wood, and are available in three unique styles: full height, caf, or tier on tier. Go for a fashion-forward choice of colour scheme by pairing the stratus grey with a dusky pink tone for a look that's both romantic and contemporary at the same time.

products.title: Daytona, Platinum Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The pale, serene platinum grey from the daytona range is pretty and subtle, making it the perfect alternative to white or cream. Choose from three styles: the classic full height, the boutique caf, or the versatile tier on tier. Use the platinum grey to complement any colour scheme. Try it with a bold plum purple for a striking and moody look in a dining room, furnishing with dark to medium woods and plenty of shimmering silvers to add a little glitz and glamour.

products.title: Daytona, Pigeon Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The soft, barely-there grey hue of the daytona in pigeon grey is subtle and serene. The flawlessly painted faux wood is durable and water-resistant, so there's no need to worry about cracking or warping. Choose from full height, tier on tier, or caf. Blend the pigeon grey with soft blues for a calming ambience in room made for relaxing, such as the living room or a nursery. Include plenty of plush fabrics to make the room welcoming and comfortable, opting for chenilles and soft wools.

products.title: Daytona, Dolphin Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in dolphin grey shows a classic light grey tone that will work in any surrounding, traditional or contemporary. Made from durable, high quality faux wood, it is designed to resist cracking and warping. Choose from three unique, attractive styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. Colour the wall surrounding the dolphin in a cheery lemon yellow that will allow the grey hue to pop in a colour scheme that's bang on trend.

products.title: Daytona, Falcon Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: A deep, characterful grey with coffee undertones, the daytona in falcon grey is striking yet understated. The water-resistant faux wood makes it ideal for use in the kitchen or the bathroom, where it won't be prone to any warping or cracking. Choose from three unique shutter styles. Settle the falcon grey into a neutrally toned room filled with greys, beiges, oatmeals, and creams. The end result will be one of understated luxe, and you'll find it relaxing and serene, perfect for a bedroom or living room.

products.title: Splash Tropez Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tropez is an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. The fabric also has beautiful light filtering properties. Electric blinds are perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any home. When purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Rock Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash rock electric roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any home. The fabric is also moisture resistant making it the perfect choice for bathrooms and kitchens. When purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Duck Egg Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash duck egg electric roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it will update most spaces, perfect for introducing colour when paired with natural and wooden tones. Electric blinds work well for hard to reach windows and help add a really modern feel to any home, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). The fabric is also moisture resistant making it the perfect choice for bathrooms and kitchens.

products.title: Splash Mid Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash mid grey electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The mid grey is a beautiful, cool grey colour which will work well with most colour palettes within the home or office. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space.
